# Government Tender Announcement for EZ899-241623: Drinking Water pH Control System
## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services invites bidders for the provision of a Drinking Water pH Control System at the Kent Maximum Institution in Agassiz, British Columbia. The contract consists of multiple components, including:

* Installation of water treatment calcite contactors and associated equipment and control systems
* Upgrade of the existing Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) system, along with the installation of a new humidity control system and associated control systems
* Structural and electrical work to support the above-mentioned components
* Painting of walls and existing piping
* Complete testing, balancing, and commissioning of each system, followed by hand-over to the owner
* Removal of asbestos-containing air ducts

## Tender Details

* **Contract Title**: EZ899-241623 - Drinking Water pH Control System
* **Reference Number**: WS4474829717-Doc4474920330
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Publication Date**: 2024-03-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-21T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **Contact Information**: Tian Lam (SPAC/PSPC), tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Specifications

The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submitted by the bidder. The notice is open to all qualified contractors. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.

## Locations

The tenders must apply to the following locations:

* Canada
* British Columbia

## Contract Overview

The contract is expected to start on 2024-04-15 and will be open-ended. The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.
